body:
Hello, 

Is there a reason my rhinoceros crash when I run the Psychometric Chart? (file with a very simple process)



Thanks, 

Ilona

replies.body:
Hi Ilona,
As [Chris pointed out in here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1157309), you seem to use an older Service Release of Rhino (1 to 4). Update it to at least Rhino 5 SR5. If you can not, [download](http://www.rhino3d.com/download/rhino/5/latest) the Rhino 5 evaluation version. Also be sure to use the latest (0.9.0076) [Grasshopper](http://www.rhino3d.com/download/grasshopper/1.0/wip) version.

Ilona,

Djordje said it all.  Thank you, Djordje!

I am pretty sure that the issue should go away upon Rhino update as it did with my peers but, if not, please let me know.

-Chris

Hi, 

Thanks for your reply. I have Rhino 5 SR4 with GH 0.9.0076. I'll try to update: )
